mapper.insert: insert into goal_complete (user_id, group_id, `completion`, is_clocked) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{completion,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{isClocked,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select user_id, group_id, `completion`, is_clocked from goal_complete
mapper.delete: delete from `goal_complete` where group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
